card.title: Abyssal Specter
card.cardText:
Flying
Whenever Abyssal Specter deals damage to a player, that player discards a card.
card.flavourText: “Open the gates, and bid them enter.” —Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

card.title: Adarkar Sentinel
card.cardText: {1}: Adarkar Sentinel gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
card.flavourText: “We encountered the Sentinels in the wastes, near no living thing. Their purpose was inscrutable.” —Disa the Restless, journal entry

card.title: Altar of Bone
card.cardText:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Search your library for a creature card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
card.flavourText: “We encountered the Sentinels in the wastes, near no living thing. Their purpose was inscrutable.” —Disa the Restless, journal entry

card.title: Aku Djinn
card.cardText:
Trample
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature each opponent controls.
card.flavourText: “Your arrogance amazes me, Kaervek. Did you not know the price you would pay?” —Mangara

card.title: Anvil of Bogardan
card.cardText:
Players have no maximum hand size.
At the beginning of each player’s draw step, that player draws an additional card, then discards a card.

card.title: Coral Atoll
card.cardText:
Coral Atoll enters the battlefield tapped.
When Coral Atoll enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you return an untapped Island you control to its owner’s hand.
{T}: Add {C}{U}.
card.flavourText: “We encountered the Sentinels in the wastes, near no living thing. Their purpose was inscrutable.” —Disa the Restless, journal entry

card.title: Elven Cache
card.cardText: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.
card.flavourText: “The elves can hide better than most can look.” —Mwani, Mtenda herder

card.title: Feral Instinct
card.cardText:
Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn’s upkeep.
card.flavourText: “If a rhino’s head is lower than its shoulders, trust me—it is not praying.” —Mwani, Mtenda herder

card.title: Adanto Vanguard
card.cardText:
As long as Adanto Vanguard is attacking, it gets +2/+0.
Pay 4 life: Adanto Vanguard gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say “destroy” don’t destroy it.)

card.title: Tishana, Voice of Thunder
card.cardText:
Tishana, Voice of Thunder’s power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your hand.
You have no maximum hand size.
When Tishana enters the battlefield, draw a card for each creature you control.

card.title: Aggressive Urge
card.cardText:
Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
Draw a card.
card.flavourText: “Our lives, our homes, and all our history are at risk. Do not speak to me of peace.”

card.title: Bosom Buddy
card.cardText: Whenever you cast a spell, you may gain 0.5 life for each word in that spell’s name.
card.flavourText: “Step 1: I believe in a power and toughness greater than myself … .”

card.title: Cardpecker
card.cardText:
Flying
Gotcha — If an opponent touches the table with their hand, you may say “Gotcha!” When you do, return Cardpecker from your graveyard to your hand.

card.title: First Come, First Served
card.cardText: Each attacking or blocking creature with the lowest collector number among attacking or blocking creatures has first strike.
card.flavourText: The Yotian soldiers hoped that one day R&D would make an artifact creature whose name starts with Z. And in their dreams, it’s a 4/1.

card.title: Gleemax
card.cardText: You choose all targets for all spells and abilities.
card.flavourText: Help us … R&D under mental domination of alien brain in jar … only chance … Gleemax’s blatant disregard for flavor text … send help
